cat_breeds.name: Siamese
cat_breeds.description: Siamese cats are known for their short coat, intense blue eyes, and distinctive color patterns. They are communicative and affectionate.

cat_breeds.name: Persian
cat_breeds.description: Persian cats have long fur and are known for their flat faces. They are calm cats and prefer quiet environments.

cat_breeds.name: Maine Coon
cat_breeds.description: The Maine Coon is one of the largest domestic cat breeds. They have long fur, large ears, and are known for being friendly and sociable.

cat_breeds.name: Bengal
cat_breeds.description: Bengal cats have a distinctive coat similar to leopards. They are active, playful, and often enjoy water.
